Author: invincibletitan33
Text: Aw I'm sorry your night didn't go as planned, especially since you'd been looking forward to it! :( Just cos things didn't work out, doesn't mean you have to continue to restrict though! It wasn't your fault, you don't need to punish yourself for something out of your control. Recovery is super tough and going back to restriction can feel like the easier option, but you can get through this!  Is there any meal or food that you're particularly craving? Maybe you could cook up a recipe that you've been wanting to try for a while? Or go back to the food-truck area? You deserve to eat something that you are looking forward to, and enjoy it :) Try to be kinder to yourself <3
